Translations.Text: niyata vaśayenma api eya balagatu rātriyehi pahaḷa kaḷemu
balagatu rātriya kumakdæ yi num̆ba va dænuvat kaḷē kumakda
balagatu rātriya māsa dahasakaṭa vaḍā utumya
malakvarun hā mahā ātmaya (jibrīl) tama paramādhipatigē anumætiyen sǣma karuṇakma gena ehi pahaḷa vannēya
śāntiyayi ! eya aruṇōdaya udā vana kālaya tek pavatiyi
vēda grantha satu janayā hā ādēśa tabannan aturin vū pratikṣēpa kaḷa aya taman veta pæhædili sādhakaya pæmiṇena tek (pratikṣēpa kirīmen) ivatvannō novūha
enam pivituru karana lada patrikā kiyavana allāhgen (ema pæhædili sādhakaya) vū dēva dūtayā ya
tavada vēda granthaya pirinamanu læbū janayā ovunaṭa pæhædili sādhakaya pæmiṇīmen pasu va misa ovuhu ven va nogiyaha
pivituru dahama allāhṭa puda karamin ohu va næmadīmaṭat salātaya sthāpita kirīmaṭat zakāt pirinæmīmaṭat misa ovuhu aṇa karanu nolæbuvōya. tavada ṛju dahama vanuyē eyayi
sæbævinma pustaka lat janayā hā ādēśa tabannan aturin vū pratikṣēpa kaḷavun nirā ginnehiya. ovuhu ehi sadātanikayō veti. ovunmaya mævīm aturin itā ayahapatma mævīma vanuyē
sæbævinma viśvāsa koṭa dæhæmi kriyāvan kaḷavun vana ovuhumaya mævīm aturin śrēṣṭha vannō
